## General Points
- Please ensure that the resouce which you want to add, must either have positive reputation or have been studied by you. 
  - Try to consider the perspective of a beginner in the technology/domain.
- Adding resource which offer in-depth knowledge or are not suitable for beginners must be marked specifically in the description.  

## Template
- A new md file for any new domain.
- Otherwise update the corresponding one.
- Each entry must have these 4 points
  - Name & Link
  - Time duration required
  - Pre-requisite required
  - Description / any special points
